gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of identity provider instances in the realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all identity provider instances configured in the specified realm.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new identity provider instance with specific configurations.
gold.ideal: Creates a new identity provider instance and returns the details of the created instance.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the identity provider instance identified by the alias.

gold.user: Admin user updating the configuration of an existing identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified identity provider instance and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an identity provider instance that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified identity provider instance and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: Admin user exporting the configuration of an identity provider instance for backup.
gold.ideal: Returns the exported configuration of the specified identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user checking the management permissions for a specific identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Returns the management permissions associated with the specified identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user updating the management permissions for an identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Updates the management permissions for the specified identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving available mapper types for an identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of available mapper types for the specified identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user listing all mappers associated with a specific identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of mappers configured for the specified identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new mapper for an identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Creates a new mapper for the specified identity provider instance and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific mapper for an identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified mapper associated with the identity provider instance.

gold.user: Admin user updating the configuration of a specific mapper for an identity provider instance.
gold.ideal: Updates the specified mapper and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific mapper that is no longer needed.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified mapper and confirms the deletion.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific identity provider by its ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the identity provider identified by the provider ID.
